QuestData.Title: Drijya Needs Your Help
QuestData.Description: $C, it is good to see a helpful face around here.$B$BThe Burning Legion at the nearby fel reaver heap has become more bold, and I am beginning to fear for our safety here. The demons are constantly receiving reinforcements from Invasion Point: Destroyer to the south.$B$BMy compatriot, Drijya, has gone down there to scout and see if he can do something about the Burning Legion's warp-gate.$B$BPlease find and assist him in any way that you can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Drijya near Invasion Point: Destroyer in the Netherstorm.
QuestData.RewardText: I hope that Gahruj has sent you to help me with my mission.
